scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist && imba build --baseurl "." server.imba && mv dist/public/__assets__ dist/public/assets && sed -i '' 's/__assets__/assets/g' dist/public/index.html && gh-pages -d dist/public/
scripts.deploy_gnu: rm -rf dist && imba build --baseurl "." server.imba && mv dist/public/__assets__ dist/public/assets && sed -i 's/__assets__/assets/g' dist/public/index.html && gh-pages -d dist/public/
